channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US futures gain as Japan keeps its key interest rate unchanged
item.description: Asian shares and U.S. futures are higher after U.S. stocks rose, regaining more of their losses for the week

item.title: Immigrants often don't open the door to ICE, but that may no longer stop officers
item.description: It has become common knowledge in immigrant communities across the U.S. to not open the door for federal immigration agents unless they show a warrant...

item.title: Illinois surgeon charged in Ohio couple's killings due in court Friday
item.description: An Illinois doctor indicted on murder charges in the December slayings of his ex-wife and her dentist husband in their Columbus home is due in an Ohio...

item.title: Texas and Oklahoma brace for snow and ice as winter storm barrels toward eastern two-thirds of US
item.description: Texas and Oklahoma are bracing for ice and heavy snow in what forecasters predict will be some of the initial major effects of a huge winter storm

item.title: Animal advocates rush to save more than 200 dogs in Mississippi before winter storm
item.description: Animal advocates are racing to rescue more than 200 dogs from a rural Mississippi property before a massive winter storm
